name: Sonoma County Housing Authority
description: Section 8 housing vouchers for Sonoma County residents
fullDescription: The Sonoma County Housing Authority administers Section 8 vouchers and affordable housing programs for low-income residents in Sonoma County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers
- Project-based vouchers
- VASH vouchers for homeless veterans
- Family self-sufficiency program
- Homeownership voucher program
howToGetIt:
1. Check SCHA website for waitlist status
2. Apply when waitlist opens
3. Must meet income limits
4. Sonoma County residents get preference
5. Wait for name on waitlist
keywords: Sonoma Housing Authority, Section 8, housing voucher, Santa Rosa, low-income, waitlist
